title: BRAND NEW 1 BED w/ ELEVATOR + GYM + ROOFTOP!! NEAR PLG AVAILABLE ASAP!
posting_body: ['Call/text Hindy (703-973-4218) for a showing today!!', 'These are BEAUTIFUL & SUNNY apartments for rent in the bustling FLATBUSH, near PLG!!', 'Each apt comes with a full Chefs kitchen, dishwasher, bathrooms with deep soak tub and all the incredible building amenities!', 'The building is complete with a FULL LUXURY gym, elevator, furnished rooftop, backyard dog run and more!!', 'You are a short 2 min walk to the 2,5 trains that can take you anywhere you want to go and just a few blocks to PROSPECT PARK!!', 'Make this your home TODAY!', 'APARTMENTS:', '- Huge Studio with Private Patio ($3000)', '- 1 Bedroom units ($2600)', '- 1 Bedroom PENTHOUSES ($2800)', '- 2 Bedroom units with in unit Washer/dryer ($3200)', 'FEATURES:', '- Full Gym', '- Elevator', '- Full Lobby', '- Furnished Roofdeck', '- Laundry In-Building', '- Spacious Bedrooms With Closets Throughout', '- Modern Bathroom With Luxury Finishes', '- Central A/C And Heat', '-Endless Amounts Of Sunlight', '- Massive Open Concept Living Room', 'Must have good credit and income!!', 'GUARANTORS WELCOME!!', 'Reach out today for a showing 703-973-4218']
